content.raw: I made a few more changes and submitted pull request #91 to replace this one. It now uses ign-rendering to generate point cloud data instead of doing it here in the cpu. The `DepthImage2Points` class is renamed to `PointCloudUtil` there and the function for converting depth to point cloud is now used in integration test to verify the new data produced by ign-rendering.
content.html: I made a few more changes and submitted pull request #91 to replace this one. It now uses ign-rendering to generate point cloud data instead of doing it here in the cpu. The DepthImage2Points class is renamed to PointCloudUtil there and the function for converting depth to point cloud is now used in integration test to verify the new data produced by ign-rendering.
